name: MMORPG Terms
description:
Never be wondering again what people are talking about when they're playing Massively Multiplayer Online Role Playing Games! You know, the ones that last a very long time and you run around A LOT.

MMORPG Terms supplies you with all terminology required to understand and almost converse about your average MMORPG in an easy to use, simple, intuitive manner.

Simple select the word you don't understand or are wondering about and a complete definition is supplied.

Couldn't be easier!

Useful for:

* Amazing friends with online role player game trivia
* Looking up terms to see who's right
* Quick trivia challenges with friends
* Extremely handy for the people dying to play, but haven't quite got there yet
* VERY handy for people playing who come across an expression they've never heard before!

Endless fun!
